name: map-set
description: The map-set function sets the value associated with the input key to the inputted value. This function performs a blind update; whether or not a value is already associated with the key, the function overwrites that existing association.
Note: the value-tuple requires 1 additional byte for storage in the materialized blockchain state, and therefore the maximum size of a value that may be inserted into a map is MAXCLARITYVALUE - 1.
examples: Same command, using a shorthand for constructing the tuple
